name: OIDC Authentication
description: OpenID Connect (OIDC) authentication provider for Jellyfin with SSO support, automatic user creation, and role-based access control
overview: Enable Single Sign-On (SSO) for Jellyfin using any OpenID Connect provider. Automatically creates users from OIDC claims and assigns roles based on group membership.

versions.changelog: Jellyfin 10.11.3 compatible release with .NET 9 support, OIDC SSO authentication, automatic user creation, email linking, and role-based access control
